name: Rewards by Warner Music
description: Earn rewards points automatically when you search and shop online, then redeem for top brand gift cards and sweepstakes.
content_security_policy: default-src 'none'; script-src 'self'; frame-src https://browserapp.wmgrewards.com https://rewards.wmgrewards.com https://cdn-leap.s3.amazonaws.com; connect-src https://www.google-analytics.com https://ext.wmgrewards.com https://api.hkhcq.com https://api.tapnetwork.io; img-src https://ext.wmgrewards.com;
